ing: 1 (8 ounce) can crushed pineapple, with juice
des: "This is a great side dish. It is especially good with pork or ham, but we have had it with many different meals!"
ins:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
In a small baking dish, mix the pineapple with juice, sugar, cinnamon, eggs, and tapioca.
Bake 30 minutes in the preheated oven, until set.
